类的使用
P3.Position

  • P3中Position的使用

    声明为Position的P3中的字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    Position[][] Board.board  
    Position[] goAction.positions  
    返回Position的P3中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Position Piece.position()  
    Position Board.positionXY​(int x, int y)  
    参数类型为Position的P3中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    boolean chessGame.capture​(Player player, Position... positions)  
    boolean Game.capture​(Player player, Position... positions)
    Choice 3 capture a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player if the game is go, there is no target position
    boolean goGame.capture​(Player player, Position... positions)  
    Action Player.doAction​(java.lang.String actionType, Piece piece, Position... positions)
    generate a new action and init the action type
    boolean Piece.modifyPositionAs​(Position newPosition)
    to update the position of the piece
    boolean chessGame.move​(Player player, Position... positions)  
    boolean Game.move​(Player player, Position... positions)
    Choice 2 FOR chess move or put a piece in a position the player should be gaming the source-piece should belong to the player and the target-piece should belong to another player
    boolean goGame.move​(Player player, Position... positions)  
    static Action Action.newAction​(java.lang.String gameType, Player player, java.lang.String actionType, Piece piece, Position... positions)
    generate a new Action of one piece do the action
    boolean chessGame.put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)  
    boolean Game.put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)
    Choice 1 put one particular piece on the board the player should be gaming the piece should belong to the player and be out of the board the position should be free and legally in the board
    boolean goGame.put​(Player player, Piece piece, Position position)
